name: Remember or Die
description:
In this game your MEMORY will keep you alive!

“Remember or Die” is memory game connected with bullet hell!

You have to match all symbols correctly to win the game.

Each time you will not get correct matching, you have a chance to activate a turret!

Be carefull and try to win! It is not always about how agile you are!

Special thanks for artist friend of mine that appeared from nowhere in the last day of jam and made that awesome symbols ! And also for Buła, mysterious man, that made gifs for me!

WARNING!

If you play in browser - use fullscreen.
